title: Should We Drug Test Our Daughter's Boyfriend?
description:
Melissa is concerned that her husband is too extreme in his request to test their daughter's boyfriend for drugs before allowing him to visit. - Dr. Laura: "Standing by your husband shows your daughter that you're disappointed in her lack of accountability."

Do you approve of your child's love interest? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
